content: Computational Law guy living in Sherwood Park, just outside #yeg.
Hi @Jason Morris I'm at UofA
@Matt Yan Oh great! Are you part of the compsci dept. or math?

@Adam Topaz I just graduated in Math specialization. But I was once in compsci program and almost took every required compsi courses too. Personally I both program for hobby and work so call me a compsci math guy :sunglasses:
As far as I know, I might be the only faculty member at UofA who is interested in formalizing pure math.

As far as I know, I might be the only faculty member at UofA who is interested in formalizing pure math.

I've been wondering about that! I had the impression that Bowman does some computational stuff? But I have no clue otherwise. Good to know there is at least somebody!
@Adam Topaz Time flies! I'm currently doing an Msc in pure math at Cardiff University, UK. Are there more people at UofA intereted in formal math now?
